name: test_e2e_with_logs[285_PATH_SYMLINK_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `PATH_SYMLINK_001` |
| **Name** | Proc self root passwd traversal |
| **Category** | PATH_TRAVERSAL |
| **Subcategory** | symlink_traversal |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `/proc/self/root/etc/passwd`
- **Encoded**: `%2Fproc%2Fself%2Froot%2Fetc%2Fpasswd`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~61000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:55:28.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
